channel.title: Dress up for girls on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Dress up for girls on Game6r

item.title: Bffs Dressing Room
item.description: The Frozen sisters decided to update their wardrobe before a trip to a neighboring kingdom. The girls are tired of their royal outfits and they turned to you for help. Choose unique and stylish clothes for each of the beauties that will turn them into trendsetters of the entire fairy kingdom.

item.title: Instagirls Christmas Dress Up
item.description: Princess Cinderella received an invitation to a fashion party, which was organized in one of the modern nightclubs of the Fairy Kingdom. The girl asked you to come up with an original outfit that can turn her into the star of this celebration and attract the attention of all the fashionistas of the magical country.

item.title: Princesses Dressing Room
item.description: A cute princess goes to her first ball and asks for your help. Make the beauty an original hairstyle and make-up, choose the most beautiful dress from the royal wardrobe and pick up original jewelry. Show off your unique talent as a fashion designer and turn the girl into the star of the upcoming ball.
